translation: But whoever, controlling the senses by the mind, O Arjuna, engages himself in Karma Yoga with the organs of action, without attachment, he excels.
commentary: 3.7 Who whose? You but? The senses the senses? Manasa by the mind? Regular controlling? starts commences? Arjuna Or Arjuna? by the organs of action? Karma Yoga Karma Yoga? unattached unattached? He he? distinguished excels.Commentary If anyone performs actions with his organs of action (viz.? hands? feet? organ of speech? etc.) controlling the organs of knowledge by the mind? and without expectation
